item.description:
Some people feel guilty eating large amounts of snacks and food but what about an incentive to eat and walk at the same time? Add in New Haven's historic and scenic streets and you'll find yourself on the New Haven Culinary Walking Tour!

The final tour of 2010 will take place on Saturday, December 11th and begins promptly at 10:45 am. Join us for approximately 2 hours as we visit up to 9 local restaurants for samples and surprises!

Our guide for the tour will be Stephen Fries, who currently serves as the Professor and Coordinator of the Hospitality Management Programs in New Haven. Stephen also currently writes a food column for the New Haven Register and has produced and hosted many academic and culinary events such as The New Haven Iron Chef Competition.

Let's join Stephen has he leads a group of hungry diners around various New Haven dining locations including the most famous, the newest and some off-the-beaten-path! Don't forget to wear comfortable walking shoes!

The cost of this special holiday themed walking tour is $69/person
(Advance ticket purchase is required)

Click HERE to Watch the Culinary Walking Tour on YouTube

Every Tour includes a goodie bag with delectable treats from other local food stores in New Haven!

Here's a list of possible stops (but locations are subject to change!):
* John Davenport's at the Omni Hotel
* Bar
* Louis' Lunch
* Willoughby's
* Caseus
* The Cupcake Truck
* Atticus
* York Noodle House
* Union League Cafe

Note: Not only is this open to the public, I also advertised it to my Meetup Group. Since there are only 16 spots available, if you're interested, you'll need to CALL QUICKLY to register! Instructions on how to register will be provided when you RSVP. I was also advised that there will be absolutely No Refunds for any reason.

When you call to make your reservation it's important to say you're WITH SHERI'S GROUP! Please also make a note in the Comment Section of your RSVP so I can keep track as to who paid.

If you would like to carpool, please make a note when you RSVP & we can figure it out as we get closer to the date.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send my cell # to all that confirm & prepay

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: New Haven Culinary Walking Tour (12/11/10)
